tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sales_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE materials (material_id INT, material_name VARCHAR(255), price DECIMAL(10,2), supplier_id INT, PRIMARY KEY(material_id));
CREATE TABLE sales (sale_id INT, material_id INT, quantity INT, sale_date DATE, PRIMARY KEY(sale_id), FOREIGN KEY(material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id));
CREATE TABLE suppliers (supplier_id INT, supplier_name VARCHAR(255), contact_email VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY(supplier_id));
CREATE TABLE sales_report (report_id INT, sale_id INT, total_price DECIMAL(10,2), quantity_sold INT, PRIMARY KEY(report_id), FOREIGN KEY(sale_id) REFERENCES sales(sale_id));

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
  sale_id INT NOT NULL,
  material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  sale_date DATE NOT NULL
);
